sources.title: Peek-a-Boo (1957)
sources.description: Casper meets a baby kitten which isn't scared of anything, including dogs and ghosts. The kitten pursues a big dog and, just when the dog is about to wreak havoc on the kitten, Casper steps in and saves the kitten. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/peek-a-boo-1957/

metadata.Plot: Casper meets a baby kitten which isn't scared of anything, including dogs and ghosts. The kitten pursues a big dog and, just when the dog is about to wreak havoc on the kitten, Casper steps in and saves the kitten.
metadata.Actors: Jack Mercer, Mae Questel, Cecil Roy
